Package dev.gamekit.components

Class RigidBody

java.lang.Object
dev.gamekit.core.Component
dev.gamekit.components.RigidBody
public class RigidBody extends Component
The RigidBody component enables physics-based motion for the entity.

During its update() phase and after a physics simulation step is complete, this component will update the attached entity's Transform component's position and rotation

    • setUserData

      Sets custom user data to this RigidBody which can be used to identify this RigidBody in collision listeners

    • setRotation

      public void setRotation(double deg, double rx, double ry, double sx, double sy)
      Sets the global rotation of this RigidBody about a point (rx, ry)

      Rotating about a non-center point changes the position, so the starting position (sx, sy) is required

    • addCircleFixture

      public void addCircleFixture(double radius, RigidBody.FixtureTuner<org.dyn4j.geometry.Circle> tuner)
      Creates a circle with the specified radius and attaches it to this RigidBody via a BodyFixture.

      After creation, the new Circle and BodyFixture are passed to the tuner for configuration before they are added to this RigidBody

    • addCircleFixture

      public void addCircleFixture(double radius)
      Creates a circle with the specified radius and attaches it to this RigidBody via a BodyFixture without additional tuning
      See Also:
      • addCircleFixture(double, FixtureTuner)

    • addRectFixture

      public void addRectFixture(double width, double height, RigidBody.FixtureTuner<org.dyn4j.geometry.Rectangle> tuner)
      Creates a rectangle with the specified width and height and attaches it to this RigidBody via a BodyFixture

      After creation, the new Rectangle and BodyFixture are passed to the tuner for configuration before they are added to this RigidBody

    • addRectFixture

      public void addRectFixture(double width, double height)
      Creates a rectangle with the specified width and height and attaches it to this RigidBody via a BodyFixture without additional tuning
      See Also:
      • addRectFixture(double, double, FixtureTuner)

    • applyImpulse

      public void applyImpulse(double x, double y)
      Applies a linear impulse vector to this RigidBody
      See Also:
      • PhysicsBody.applyImpulse(Vector2)

    • applyTorque

      public void applyTorque(double torque)
      Applies a torque about the center of this RigidBody
      See Also:
      • PhysicsBody.applyTorque(double)

    • addCollisionListener

      public void addCollisionListener(Physics.CollisionListener listener)
      Attaches a collision listener to this RigidBody. When this RigidBody collides with other rigid bodies, this listener is invoked with the details of the collision

      The listener is automatically removed when the host entity is disposed

    • start

      protected void start()
      Description copied from class: Component
      Called when attached to an Entity to set up the component

      NB: The value of Component.entity is set before this method is called and can safely be accessed here.
